Question: Shenzhen Creality 3D Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Creality 3D Technology Co., Ltd.

Product 1

- Creality K1C: A CoreXY 3D printer with a maximum speed of 600 mm/s, capable of 3D printing with carbon fiber filament and standard PLA. It features an all-metal hotend, new build plate, improved motor system, and an enclosed structure.

- Ender-3 V3: Offers 600 mm/s 3D print speeds, a 220 x 220 x 250 mm build volume, and is equipped with a 4.3-inch capacitive touchscreen and Creality OS for home users and 3D printing farms.

- CR-10 SE: Features automatic first-layer leveling with CR Touch, high-speed printing, and support for various filaments, with a maximum print speed of 600 mm/s, targeting advanced users.

- Creality Falcon2 (40W/22W): A powerful laser engraver with Dynamic Spot Size Adjustment, capable of cutting through wood and stainless steel at high speeds.

- CR-Scan Ferret Pro: An advanced 3D scanner with high-speed WiFi 6 and single-frame 3D imaging, suitable for scanning dark or metallic surfaces without the need for spray.

- Sermoon D3: A reliable 3D printer with high-temperature printing resistance of up to 300°C, 5x printing speed, and multi-printer controls, designed for industrial designers and available across various countries.

- K1 Series: Includes K1 and K1 Max, professional-grade CoreXY 3D printers with a printing speed of up to 600 mm/s, build volume of up to 300x300x300 mm, and advanced features such as Creality OS, Cluster control, and AI camera for remote monitoring.

- HALOT-MAGE Series: Offers smart resin printing solutions for jewelry, dentistry, crafts, and custom-made products, with features such as high printing speeds, large 8K LCD screens, and agile Dynax motion systems.

- Other 3D Printing Solutions: Includes CR-Scan Ferret, Falcon2 40W, Nebula Pad+ AI LiDAR, and a series of 3D-printed footwear solutions, catering to different 3D printing needs.

- Company Background: Shenzhen Creality 3D Technology Co., Ltd. focuses on designing, researching, and producing 3D printers and related products, with a self-owned factory certified to CE, FCC, and ROHS standards, and exporting products to over 100 countries.
Summary_cn:
深圳创实3D技术有限公司。

产品1

- Creality K1C：一款CoreXY 3D打印机，最高速度600毫米/秒，能够使用碳纤维丝和标准PLA进行3D打印。它具有全金属热端、新的打印平台、改进的电机系统和封闭结构。

- Ender-3 V3：提供600毫米/秒的3D打印速度，220 x 220 x 250毫米的建模体积，并配备4.3英寸的电容触摸屏和Creality OS，适用于家庭用户和3D打印工场。

- CR-10 SE：具有CR Touch自动调平功能，高速打印，并支持各种丝材，最高打印速度达600毫米/秒，面向高级用户。

- Creality Falcon2 (40W/22W)：一款强大的激光雕刻机，具有动态焦点调节功能，能够以高速切割木材和不锈钢。

- CR-Scan Ferret Pro：一款先进的3D扫描仪，具有高速WiFi 6和单帧3D成像功能，适用于扫描不需要喷雾的黑暗或金属表面。

- Sermoon D3：一款可靠的3D打印机，耐高温打印高达300°C，5倍打印速度和多打印机控制，专为工业设计师设计，可在多个国家提供。

- K1系列：包括K1和K1 Max，专业级CoreXY 3D打印机，最高打印速度达600毫米/秒，建模体积可达300x300x300毫米，并具有Creality OS、Cluster控制和AI摄像头等高级功能，可进行远程监控。

- HALOT-MAGE系列：为珠宝、牙科、手工艺品和定制产品提供智能树脂打印解决方案，具有高打印速度、大尺寸8K LCD屏幕和灵活的Dynax运动系统。

- 其他3D打印解决方案：包括CR-Scan Ferret、Falcon2 40W、Nebula Pad+ AI LiDAR和一系列3D打印鞋类解决方案，满足不同的3D打印需求。

- 公司背景：深圳创实3D技术有限公司专注于设计、研究和生产3D打印机及相关产品，拥有自有工厂，通过CE、FCC和ROHS认证，并将产品出口到100多个国家。
